Control.Name: AllowOffspec
Control.Tooltip: If bidder writes !off he will bid for offspec.

Control.Name: BoxHidden
Control.Tooltip: Everybody whisps their bids to you.

Control.Name: BoxOpen
Control.Tooltip: Everybody writes their bids into /party channel.

Control.Name: PureRoll
Control.Tooltip: Participants just type /roll and their rolls are collected.

Control.Name: ModifiedRoll
Control.Tooltip: To every roll X% of participant's DKP is added.The whole price is subtracted from his Net value.

Control.Name: OneMore
Control.Tooltip: The winner will pay the value of 2nd highest bid + 1.

Control.Name: Field
Control.Tooltip: Amount of DKP needed to be added on top of previous highest bid.

Control.Text: Item Cost =( item power / quality)* * slot value
Control.Name: FormulaLabel
Help
Control.Tooltip: This addon can work in two modes : DKP or EPGP.By switching to EPGP mode every players is assigned with EP and GP values , but the DKP ones are still valid.You can display all values but you are allowed to modify ones coresponding to the mode you have chosen.You can set EP/GP/PR Labels by pressing the "+" button left to the labels.

Control.Name: Reset
Control.Tooltip: Resets Both EP and GP of members and brings the default values for loot.

Control.Name: Window4
Control.Tooltip: Press Enter to submit the value.

Control.Name: Help
Control.Tooltip: List of Items Collected This session with their costs.

Control.Name: ButtonSendToChat
Control.Tooltip: Link selected item(s) to chat with their cost values.

Control.Name: ButtonForceSave
Control.Tooltip: All items will be saved , it's up to You when to remove them.

Control.Name: EditBox
Control.Tooltip: Type the name of player yu want to add and then press Enter.
